data.title: Marie de Medici, second wife of King Henry IV of France
meta_keywords: marie medici second wife king henry iv france
data.meta_description: Prints of Marie de Medici, second wife of King Henry IV of France. Handcoloured lithograph after a contemporary print
data.text:
Marie de Medici, second wife of King Henry IV of France. Handcoloured lithograph after a contemporary print of the wedding from Le Bibliophile Jacob aka Paul Lacroixs Costumes Historiques de la France (Historical Costumes of France), Administration de Librairie, Paris, 1852. Mary Evans Picture Library makes available wonderful images created for people to enjoy over the centuries. Â© Florilegius/Mary Evans

Media ID 23156214

Administration Bibliophile Henri Historiques Jacob Lacroix Librairie Marie Medicis

Framed Prints

Bring a touch of royal history into your home with our exquisite Framed Prints from Media Storehouse. This stunning piece features Marie de Medici, the captivating second wife of King Henry IV of France, as depicted in a beautifully hand-colored lithograph from Mary Evans Prints Online. The intricate details of this contemporary representation of their wedding, taken from Le Bibliophile Jacob aka Paul Lacroix's Costumes Historiques de la, are sure to impress. Each print is carefully framed to preserve its beauty and add an air of sophistication to any room in your home. Elevate your decor and embrace the rich history of the past with this magnificent Framed Print from Media Storehouse.

Photo Prints

Bring historical elegance into your home with our exquisite Marie de Medici photographic print from the Media Storehouse collection. This stunning handcoloured lithograph, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, showcases the second wife of King Henry IV of France in all her regal beauty. The intricate detail and vibrant colors of this image, taken from Le Bibliophile Jacob aka Paul Lacroix's Costumes Historiques de la, will transport you back in time. Each print is carefully produced to preserve the original artwork's integrity, making it a unique and captivating addition to any room. Elevate your decor and celebrate the rich history of the past with this magnificent print from Media Storehouse.

Poster Prints

Bring history to life with our exquisite Marie de Medici Poster Print from Media Storehouse. This stunning handcoloured lithograph, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, captures the essence of Marie de Medici, the second wife of King Henry IV of France, as depicted in Le Bibliophile Jacob's Costumes Historiques de la. Add a touch of royal elegance to your home or office with this beautifully detailed and authentic reproduction of this iconic image from the past. Rights Managed through Media Storehouse ensures the highest quality and authenticity for your enjoyment.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Step into the world of 17th-century French royalty with our exquisite Marie de Medici jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse. This captivating puzzle, featuring a handcoloured lithograph after a contemporary print from Le Bibliophile Jacob aka Paul Lacroix's Costumes Historiques de la, invites you to explore the opulence and grandeur of the time. Discover the intricate details of Marie de Medici's elegant attire and the rich textures of the royal court. Assemble this beautiful puzzle and bring history to life in your own home.
